pages.title: Mermaid's Brushes
pages.text: Mermaid's Brushes are inconspicuous plants that grow in the deepest depths of the oceans, forever untouched by human influence.$(br2)They grow a single blossom, which slowly develops into a pearl-shaped seed. Fully grown, these hollow seeds float to the surface to be carried away by the soft waves.

pages.title: Mermaid's Gems
pages.text: Those seeds can be planted again, growing an additional plant.$(br2)Mermaid's Gems have a strong bond with water - obviously.
